gameplay.tb_lore: *Clouds roll in over Ravenswood Bluff, engulfing this sleepy town and its superstitious inhabitants in foreboding shadow. Anxious mothers call their children home from play, as thunder begins to clap on the horizon. Those who can read the signs know there is...* ***Trouble Brewing***.

cmd_warnings.dm_only: {}Â {} You may not use this command outside of DM channel.
cmd_warnings.lobby_only: {} {} You may not use this command outside of the public lobby channel.
cmd_warnings.alive_only: {} {} You may not use this command while dead.
cmd_warnings.dead_only: {} {} You may not use this command while alive.
cmd_warnings.day_only: {} {} You may not use this command during nighttime.
cmd_warnings.night_only: {}Â {} You may not use this command during daytime.
cmd_warnings.target_nb: {} {} You must choose exactly **{}** target{} for your ability. Note that the separator `and` is a special keyword and allows you to input multiple targets.

serve.help: The bot recognizes usernames, nicknames, user ID's and discriminators. If your role allows for multiple targets, use 'and' to separate each of them. Please use the command in DM.
serve.feedback: You have decided to serve **{}** as your master.
